effect.name: Chroma Hold
effect.description: Remove all color information for all colors except for certain one.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.color
Color key
parameter.comment: The color which will not be replaced with neutral chroma

parameter.name: av.similarity
Similarity
parameter.comment:
Similarity percentage with the select color
0.01 matches only the exact key color, while 1.0 matches everything.

parameter.name: av.blend
Blend
parameter.comment:
Blend percentage. 0.0 makes pixels either fully grey, or not grey at all.
Higher values result in more preserved color.

parameter.name: av.yuv
YUV color
parameter.comment: Select this if the clip has YUV data instead of RGB.
